ai-tha-ap77:1.2_0: he’s a disciple who sees clearly,
ai-tha-ap77:2.2_0: the moon shining in the sky,
ai-tha-ap77:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap77:2.4_0: this alms food is the fruit of result.
ai-tha-ap77:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Jotika.
ai-tha-ap77:6.1_0: This is the fifth Elder Nun Senior (Discourses).
